entry.title: Crimson Rings
entry.summary:
Author: flourishedpeony

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,390Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: “Just wait until you see it in front of your own eyes.” Dick makes sure to emphasize the final words as he motions Jason to look across the dance floor.There you stand, on the edge of the dance floor. The crimson-colored velvet fabric flows across your frame like waves in a calm sea. Your hair meticulously detailed and styled drifts down from your neck and lightly touches your bare shoulders. A rose-gold pendant rests in the dip of your chest.Your piercing eyes scan the crowd, searching across the mingling elite for a certain someone. Their dim glow reaches Jason even from the distance between you two—it turns luminous when you spot him.He almost chokes on his breath.

entry.title: Little Red
entry.summary:
Author: forestpixie

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,462Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Jason Todd had taken control of the underground drug trafficking in Gotham as The Red Hood, by using methods his former mentor Bruce Wayne would never approve of.All of that so he could confront him and make him choose between killing the Joker or him. After the big fight, he was brought back to the manor to recover from the injuries the explosion caused. He refused, as expected, to move back in, still finding it difficult to look Bruce in the face, but he kept in contact, sometimes being called in by one of his bat-siblings to assist on a mission, thanksgiving dinner, or just an overly complicated prank.A couple of years later, just when things seemed to finally calm down, when Jason started to believe he could be a part of the Wayne family, the Joker’s goons are seen back in town, looking for someone. Looking for her.

entry.title: Enthusiasm
entry.summary:
Author: jjenthusee

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,565Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 21

Summary: After a rough night of patrol, Jason is finding it difficult to come down from the intensity. Anxiety and adrenaline don't mix well with his self-deprecating thoughts. He hates coming home to you in this state, like the world is moving and his legs are mindlessly walking without him knowing. He keeps moving, trying to act normal, but the threshold from domestic life and stopping mind-numbing criminals is too much. And once again, he has to rely on you to bring him down, back into the warmth of your shared apartment and within the realms of being in your safety net. You have to remind him, that sometimes the most intimidating can be the most tender.

entry.title: Like Him
entry.summary:
Author: jjenthusee

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,291Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 17

Summary: Gravely putting one foot in front of the other, ignoring the painful burn in your leg, you try to reach Jason, the Arkham Knight. Just hours ago, were you captured and tortured by his goons, feeling exhausted and pushed to your limits. You were finally released, given by an order from the one man you never thought you would see again and now he wants to leave a second time. Injuries were not going to stop you from trying to talk to him, to understand why this hell of a night was getting worse, but what hurts more? The initial burn or what comes after?
